text:
Huq Industries | London | Senior Data Engineer | ONSITE | Â£50k-85k

Huq provides real world, real time consumer insights at unprecedented scale. https://huq.io

We are looking for senior data engineers to help build out our data pipelines and warehouses. We are a small, highly capable and efficient team with a great working environment in Central London.

Full job spec : https://huq.io/openings/2016/08/24/senior-data-engineer/

Currently we use Python, Django and Postgres but will be moving to more scaleable architecture.

Interviews will be in person and will comprise a technical test, technical interview and informal discussion with the senior team.

Please contact isambard@huq.io with CV and SO/Github links.
